tool_description: Collects and categorizes patient symptoms with severity ratings, duration, and associated factors to support clinical assessment and triage.

symptom_duration.description: How long symptoms have been present

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient must be registered in the system.
Missing primary symptom: Primary symptom description is required.
Invalid duration format: Duration must be specified with time unit (hours, days, weeks, months).
Severity out of range: Severity must be between 1 and 10.
usage: Provide patient ID, primary symptom description, duration, and severity rating to document current symptoms for clinical review.

triage_priority.description: Recommended triage level (low, medium, high, urgent)

red_flags.description: Any concerning symptoms requiring immediate attention
